name: semaphore-ui
description: Semaphore is a self-hosted web UI for running Ansible playbooks and managing inventories, keys, and environments. It centralizes automation tasks in a modern dashboard with role-based access for teams.
features: Ansible web UI: Run Ansible playbooks through an intuitive web interface.
Inventory management: Organize and manage hosts, groups, and variables visually.
Playbook execution: Trigger playbook runs with custom variables and tags.
Task templates: Create reusable task templates for common automation workflows.
SSH key management: Store and manage SSH keys securely for host authentication.
Environment variables: Define environment-specific variables for different deployments.
Execution history: View logs and results of past playbook runs with filtering.
Role-based access: Control who can view, edit, or execute specific playbooks.
Scheduling: Run playbooks on schedules or trigger them via webhooks.
Real-time output: Stream playbook execution output live in the browser.
Multi-project support: Organize playbooks and inventories into separate projects.
Notification system: Send alerts on playbook completion or failure via email or webhooks.
